Name: Ball laB 2
About the game: Ball laB 2 again invites the player to return to difficult challenges. New and even more interesting levels await you, with new traps, challenges and mechanics. Your goal is to get from the beginning of the level to the end without dying from spikes, pits or other dangers. Features 50 levels 3 difficulty levels
